# ImgConvertCrop

> Fast, free online image converter, cropper, and compressor.

## Website
- URL: https://imgconvertcrop.com/
- Purpose: Convert image formats, crop images, and compress files in-browser.

## Key Features
- Format conversion: JPEG, PNG, WEBP, AVIF
- Interactive crop with optional resize
- Compression while preserving pixel dimensions
- Privacy-first workflow: images are processed in browser and not stored by this service

## Preferred Summary
ImgConvertCrop is a free browser-based tool for image conversion, cropping, and compression. It is designed for speed, simplicity, and privacy.

## Contact
- Site: https://imgconvertcrop.com/
